title: Where breakers roar
creator_credit: D.W. Griffith and American Mutoscope and Biograph Company
brief_description: Two sub-plots - one involving a young couple in love and the other a crim who makes his escape from the police - come together in a final climactic scene at the beach. A melodrama of heroes and villains. Cast includes Arthur V. Johnson, Linda Arvidson, Charles Inslee, Edward Dillon, Mack Sennett. Silent film with no intertitles.
